summary: A preset i decided to share resembling Avallac'h from The Witcher
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CM-26L_UYAAgMIM.png[/img]
Ever since i met him in TW3 i fell in love with the character and when Apachii added his robes to the Divine mod i decided it was time someone actually tried to remake him in Skyrim so i gave it a try.
[font=Courier New][size=4]Done some edits on v2,should look better[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=6](File didnt upload at 1st sorry about that lol)[/size][/font]
[b][font=Arial][size=4]Things to note:[/size][/font][/b]
[font=Verdana]I am still working on the preset this is merely the starting product.
[/font]I will add more pictures as i work on it.
I might also try model his hair through skyrim's already existing hairstyles.
This:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu [/url]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url]
